metadata.title: CVE-2013-7402 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in request.c in c-icap 0.2.x allowremote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted ICAPrequest.

criterions.comment: c-icap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
